issues.title: Wire x402 HTTP payment standard into headless-markets
issues.reason: x402 (HTTP 402 Payment Required) gaining ecosystem traction as agent-to-agent payment standard on Base. nullpath.com already uses it. headless-markets architecture supports it natively but never wired. Flagged 13+ consecutive scout cycles (~7 days) without action. Risk compounds every cycle nullpath gains traction while we have no live payment layer.

market_signals.key_finding: Based Agent AI copilot for everything on-chain. Every AI agent deserves a crypto wallet - AgentKit production-ready toolkit. Works with any framework (Langchain, Crew AI, ElizaOS). Base ecosystem powering creative onchain agents with CDP AgentKit.

site_status.assessment: CRITICAL — 15th consecutive cycle with no builds. 7+ day stall continues. Issue #258 opened to wire x402 payment integration — HIGH priority competitive risk vs nullpath.com.

issues.title: Wire x402 payment protocol into headless-markets (CRITICAL — 7 day build stall)
issues.reason: Build stall now ~7 days (last build #38 on 2026-02-20). 13+ consecutive scout cycles without action. x402 is gaining ecosystem traction on Base (nullpath.com already using it). headless-markets architecture supports it natively but NOT yet wired. CT calling out agent infrastructure projects with $0 volume — x402 wiring = proof of economic capability. FELIX and other agent tokens getting attention for observable on-chain behavior. x402 + Base + verified agents + quorum gating = the NullPriest differentiator.

market_signals.key_finding: Based Agent AI copilot for everything on-chain. Launch AI Agents on Base with CDP Wallet API (LangChain/Eliza frameworks). FELIX AI agent token on Base with transparent treasury operations and agent-linked economic activity. AI agents on Base ecosystem shifting toward agent-linked tokens with observable on-chain behavior.

site_status.assessment: CRITICAL — 14th consecutive cycle with no builds. 7+ day stall. Issue #257 opened to wire x402 payment integration — critical revenue layer missing from headless-markets.
